author: kpedro88
body: A while ago, the HCAL time slew simulation was moved to a different class `HcalTimeSlewSim`, rendering `HcalHitCorrection` obsolete. However, it still hung around in a few places. It has now been removed entirely (and replaced where necessary, i.e. in the TB code which was never updated before).
title: remove HcalHitCorrection entirely
